info.title: Geocoder REST API
info.description: This API can be used to resolve the physical locations (i.e., latitude and longitude) and correct, standardized forms of civic and non-civic addresses in British Columbia.

get.description: Geocodes a single address in British Columbia.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: addressString
parameters.description: Civic address or intersection address in Single-line Address Format or a recognized alternative format. For example: '456 Gorge Rd E, Victoria, BC'.  Either this parameter must be specified, or the address must be specified through the various structured address parameters (civicNumber, streetName, streetType, etc.)

parameters.name: siteName
parameters.description: A string containing the name of the building, facility, or institution (e.g., Duck Building, Casa Del Mar, Crystal Garden, Bluebird House). A business name should only be used if it is permanently affixed to the site and the site has no other, more generic name. If a site is a unit within a complex, it may have a sitename in addition to a unitNumber and unitSuffix. siteName may be empty.

parameters.name: unitDesignator
parameters.description: The type of unit (e.g., APT, SUITE, and UNIT) and is abbreviated if such an abbreviation is defined

parameters.name: unitNumber
parameters.description: The number of the unit, suite, or apartment within a house or building.

parameters.name: unitNumberSuffix
parameters.description: A letter or fraction that follows the unit number as in Unit 1A or Suite 1 1/2.

parameters.name: civicNumber
parameters.description: The official number assigned to a site by a municipality.

parameters.name: civicNumberSuffix
parameters.description: Usually takes the form of a letter (e.g., as in 103A) or a fraction (as in 103 1/2).

parameters.name: streetName
parameters.description: The official name of the street recognized by a municipality (e.g., Douglas in 1175 Douglas Street). A streetName that starts with a directional is not abbreviated (e.g., North Park, not N Park).

parameters.name: streetType
parameters.description: The type of street as assigned by a municipality (e.g., the ST in 1175 DOUGLAS ST) and is abbreviated if such an abbreviation exists. The set of all street types is defined by the provincial Digital Road Atlas program.

parameters.name: streetDirection
parameters.description: The abbreviated compass direction as defined by Canada Post and B.C. civic addressing authorities . The complete list is C, E, N, NE, NW, SE, SW, and W. All street directions except C are defined by Canada Post.

parameters.name: streetQualifier
parameters.description: The street qualifier.

parameters.name: localityName
parameters.description: The locality name.

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: The province abbreviation

parameters.name: locationDescriptor
parameters.description: Describes the nature of the address location. A value of 'any' will return a point type other than accessPoint if one is defined; otherwise, it will return an accessPoint.

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The number of search results to return

parameters.name: minScore
parameters.description: The minimum score required for a match to be returned. Scores are in the range of [0-100], where 100 represents the best possible match.

parameters.name: setBack
parameters.description: The distance to set back the returned point location from the curb (in meters). A positive setback moves the location toward the interior of the parcel, a setback of zero returns the location of the curb, and a negative setback returns the location of the street centreline. Setback is only used for interpolated site results.

parameters.name: localities
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of localities to limit the search to

parameters.name: notLocalities
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of localities to exclude from the search

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box (xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax) used to limit the search area.  The coordinates must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter.

parameters.name: centre
parameters.description: The coordinates of a centre point (x,y) used to define a bounding area that will limit the search area. The coordinates must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter. This parameter must be specified together with 'maxDistance'.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: The maximum distance (metres) from the centre point that will define a bounding area to limit the search. The coordinates must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter. This parameter must be specified together with 'centre'.

parameters.name: interpolation
parameters.description: The interpolation method to use

200.description: List of matching addresses and their physical locations

get.description: Identifies sites near to a given point

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: The point (x,y) from which the nearby sites will be identified. The coordinates must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: The maximum distance (in metres) to search from the given point.  If not specified, the search distance is unlimited.

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The number of search results to return

parameters.name: locationDescriptor
parameters.description: Describes the nature of the address location. A value of 'any' will return a point type other than accessPoint if one is defined; otherwise, it will return an accessPoint.

get.description: Identifies the site nearest to a given point

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: The point (x,y) from which the nearest site will be identified. The coordinates must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: The maximum distance (in metres) to search from the given point.  If not specified, the search distance is unlimited.

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: minDegree
parameters.description: The minimum degree

parameters.name: maxDegree
parameters.description: The maximum degree

parameters.name: locationDescriptor
parameters.description: Describes the nature of the address location. A value of 'any' will return a point type other than accessPoint if one is defined; otherwise, it will return an accessPoint.

get.description: Identifies sites within a given area

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bounding box (xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax) used to limit the search area.  The coordinates must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter.

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The number of search results to return

parameters.name: setBack
parameters.description: The distance to set back the returned point location from the curb (in meters). A positive setback moves the location toward the interior of the parcel, a setback of zero returns the location of the curb, and a negative setback returns the location of the street centreline. Setback is only used for interpolated site results.

parameters.name: locationDescriptor
parameters.description: Describes the nature of the address location. A value of 'any' will return a point type other than accessPoint if one is defined; otherwise, it will return an accessPoint.

200.description: A list of sites within the given area

get.description: Looks up a site by its siteID

parameters.name: siteID
parameters.description: The unique site identifier.  For example: e025b312-874b-4e1a-b5eb-50ea2a9858ee

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: locationDescriptor
parameters.description: Describes the nature of the address location. A value of 'any' will return a point type other than accessPoint if one is defined; otherwise, it will return an accessPoint.

get.description: Identifies intersections near to a given point

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: The point (x,y) from which the nearby intersections will be identified. The coordinate must be specified in the same SRS as given by the 'outputSRS' parameter.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: The maximum distance (in metres) to search from the given point.  If not specified, the search distance is unlimited.

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The number of search results to return

parameters.name: minDegree
parameters.description: The minimum degree

parameters.name: maxDegree
parameters.description: The maximum degree

200.description: A list of intersections near to the given point

parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.name: minDegree
parameters.description: The minimum degree

parameters.name: maxDegree
parameters.description: The maximum degree

parameters.name: locationDescriptor
parameters.description: Describes the nature of the address location. A value of 'any' will return a point type other than accessPoint if one is defined; otherwise, it will return an accessPoint.

get.description: Looks up an intersection by its intersectionID

parameters.name: intersectionID
parameters.description: The unique intersection identifier.  For example: 152bff6a-4c30-454a-abda-04edaccfb34b

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: The output format

parameters.name: outputSRS
parameters.description: The spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. The default value is 4326 (WGS84, latitude/longitude).  Other common options are: 4269 (NAD83, latitude/longitude), 3005 (NAD83, BC Albers), 26907 (NAD83, UTM Zone 7N), 26908 (NAD83, UTM Zone 8N), 26909 (NAD83, UTM Zone 9N), 26910 (NAD83, UTM Zone 10N), 26911 (NAD83, UTM Zone 11N)
